summary.span: 表示 控制項中的項目。

span.span: Represents an item in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項是類似於，因為它會顯示項目清單。The control is similar to a in that it displays a list of items. 主要差異在於控制項可讓您提供的使用者可以檢視各種項目數目。The main difference is that the control provides a number of different ways items can be viewed by the user. 類別會定義外觀、 行為和資料會顯示在項目相關聯控制項。The class defines the appearance, behavior, and data associated with an item that is displayed in the control. 物件可以顯示在其中一種四種不同檢視的控制項。 objects can be displayed in the control in one of four different views. 為大型或小型圖示或小圖示，以垂直清單時，會顯示項目。Items can be displayed as large or small icons or as small icons in a vertical list. 項目也可以有子項目，包含與父項目相關的資訊。Items can also have subitems that contain information that is related to the parent item. 第四個檢視的樣式，詳細資料檢視，可讓您以具有資料行標頭，可用來識別要顯示子項目中的資訊的方格中顯示的項目和它的子項目。The fourth view style, details view, allows you to display the item and its subitems in a grid with column headers that can be used to identify the information being displayed in a subitem. 大部分的屬性類別提供方法來變更中的項目顯示與其相關聯的控制項。Most of the properties of the class provide ways to change the display of the item in the control it is associated with. ， ，並屬性可讓您變更項目的文字中的顯示方式控制項。The , , and properties allow you to change how the text of the item is displayed in the control. 屬性可讓您指定要從載入的映像指派給控制項 (藉由設定或是屬性)。The property allows you to specify the image to load from the that is assigned to the control (by setting the or properties of the ). 項目可以顯示核取方塊，以便在使用者中類似的方式來取得項目選擇控制項。Items can display check boxes in order to obtain item choices from the user in a way similar to a control. 您可以使用屬性來判斷是否會檢查項目，或是選取或清除核取方塊，在執行階段。You can use the property to determine if an item is checked, or to select or clear the check box at run time. 項目可以顯示任何數目的子項時相關聯的屬性控制設為和資料行中所定義的控制項。Items can display any number of subitems when the property of the associated control is set to and columns are defined in the of the control. 您可以將子項目加入項目藉由呼叫方法的類別。You can add subitems to an item by calling the method of the class. 屬性可讓您存取類別和其成員。The property allows you to gain access to the class and its members. 屬性和方法的一些類別是屬性和方法中的項目特定版本控制項。Some of the properties and methods of the class are item-specific versions of properties and methods in the control. 例如，方法是類似於版本的方法，但版本會影響目前項目。For example, the method is similar to the version of the method, but the version affects only the current item. 類別也會提供方法，不是舊版方法。The class also provides methods that are not versions of methods. 方法的項目將文字放入編輯模式，讓使用者可以變更項目的文字 (當屬性控制設為 `true`)。The method places the item's text into edit mode so the user can change the item's text (when the property of the control is set to `true`). 方法可讓您建立的現有複本物件來重複使用其他控制項。The method allows you to create copies of existing objects to reuse in other controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立有三個控制項指定的物件和三個每個項目所指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示的子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 您要新增的程式碼並呼叫建構函式或在表單上的另一種方法從範例中所建立的方法。You need to add the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例需要映像名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來變更顯示項目文字的背景色彩。You can use the property to change the color displayed behind the item text. 如果您想要使用不同的背景和前景色彩組合，就可以使用這個屬性 (使用屬性來設定前景色彩) 從另一個區隔一個項目。This property can be used if you want to use different background and foreground color combinations (using the property to set the foreground color) to differentiate one item from another. 例如，您可以設定屬性設識別驗證失敗或遺失子項目資訊的項目。For example, you could set the property to to identify items that have failed validation or are missing subitem information. 如果您想要使用相同的背景色彩的項目的所有子項目，設定屬性設`true`。If you want to use the same background color for all subitems of an item, set the property to `true`. 這會導致的色彩和字型指定項目的所有子項目文字的使用。This will cause the colors and fonts specified for the item to be used for all subitem text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性才會生效才的屬性控制項，其中包含項目設為`true`。This property is effective only if the property of the control that contains the item is set to `true`. 若要強制項目的文字來顯示處於編輯模式，您可以在執行階段使用這個方法。You can use this method at run time to force the item's text to display in edit mode. 例如，如果您要驗證使用者、 編輯項目文字和項目驗證失敗，您可以選取中的項目控制項，並呼叫方法，以強制使用者變更驗證失敗的文字。For example, if you are validating the item text edited by the user, and an item fails validation, you could select the item in the control and call the method to force the user to change the text that failed validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來取得整個項目週框。You can use this method to obtain the bounding rectangle of an entire item. 如果您想要取得整個項目部分的周框，使用方法。If you want to obtain the bounding rectangle for a portion of the entire item, use the method. 類別提供位於控制項內的方法，可讓您取得的任何項目的週框。The class provides a method that allows you to get the bounding rectangle of any item located within the control. 傳回的週框矩形會使用用戶端控制項的座標相對於包含目前可見區域的左上角。The returned bounding rectangle uses client control coordinates that are relative to the top-left corner of the currently visible area of the containing . 如果是可捲動和定位以便不是可見的傳回的座標可以是負數。If the is scrollable and positioned so that the is not visible, the coordinates returned may be negative. 當屬性的值為，週框矩形的寬度是包含的項目，項目中文字的寬度的資料行的寬度。When the property has a value of , the width of the bounding rectangle is the width of the column containing the item, not the width of the text in the item. 如果集合未包含任何資料行中，使用 60 像素為單位的預設資料行寬度。If the collection does not contain any columns, the default column width of 60 pixels is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性相當實用才的屬性項目中包含的控制項設為`true`。This property is useful only if the property of the control the item is contained in is set to `true`. 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷如果項目有已選取使用者，或透過程式碼在執行階段。You can use this property to determine if the item has been checked by the user or through code at run time. 若要判斷簽入的所有項目控制項，您可以使用屬性。To determine all the items that are checked in a control, you can use the property. 已核取項目時，請採取動作，您可以建立的事件處理常式屬性控制項。To take action when an item has been checked, you can create an event handler for the property of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立有三個控制項指定的物件和三個每個項目所指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示的子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 您要新增的程式碼並呼叫建構函式或在表單上的另一種方法從範例中所建立的方法。You need to add the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例需要映像名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. summary.span: 取得或設定指派此項目至其中的群組。

span.span: Gets or sets the group to which the item is assigned.

value.span: 指派此項目至其中的 。

span.span: The to which the item is assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可用於設定項目所屬的群組。Use this property to set the group to which an item belongs. 您也可以設定群組建構函式，或者您可以使用這個屬性在執行階段修改的群組成員資格。You can also set the group in the constructor, or you can use this property to modify the group membership at run time. 如果您將這個屬性設定為`null`中的群組而集合項目會出現在預設群組中，具有標頭標籤"DefaultGroupSystem.Windows.Forms 」。If you set this property to `null` and there are groups in the collection, the item will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroupSystem.Windows.Forms". 預設群組未包含在集合，而且不能更改。The default group is not contained in the collection, and cannot be altered. 它主要是用於偵錯，以確保所有項目有已正確新增至群組。It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups. > [!NOTE] > 群組是僅適用於 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列 ([!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)])。 groups are only available on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family ([!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)]). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 概觀主題。For more information, see the overview topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何屬性可用的應用程式，會將組織詳細資料檢視中的子項目值的項目。The following code example demonstrates how the property can be used in an application that organizes items by subitem value in the details view. 這種形式是群組的類似於 Windows 檔案總管中所使用的群組。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在範例中，會以動態方式建立的群組。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 每一個子項目的資料行中，一個群組會針對每個唯一子項目的值。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父項目資料行中，建立一個群組的每個唯一的首字母。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 針對每個資料行建立的群組會儲存在雜湊表，以及首字母的子項目文字。The groups created for each column are stored in a hash table along with the subitem text or initial letter. 按一下資料行標頭時，會擷取對應於該資料行的雜湊資料表。When a column header is clicked, the hash table corresponding to that column is retrieved. 接下來，該資料行的子項目文字值會用做為雜湊表索引鍵來擷取正確的群組，每個項目。Next, the subitem text values for that column are used as hash table keys to retrieve the correct group for each item. 項目接著會指派給群組使用屬性。The item is then assigned to the group using the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分屬性。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用，您可以將子項目加入、 移除子項目，並取得子項目的計數。Using the , you can add subitems, remove subitems, and obtain a count of subitems. 如需有關可以在集合中的子項目執行的工作的詳細資訊，請參閱類別參考主題。For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the subitems in the collection, see the class reference topics. > [!NOTE] > 中的第一個子項目永遠是擁有子項目的項目。The first subitem in the is always the item that owns the subitems. 在執行作業時的子項目集合中，請務必參考而不是 0，對第一個子項目進行變更的索引位置 1。When performing operations on subitems in the collection, be sure to reference index position 1 instead of 0 to make changes to the first subitem. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立有三個控制項指定的物件和三個每個項目所指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示的子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 您要新增的程式碼並呼叫建構函式或在表單上的另一種方法從範例中所建立的方法。You need to add the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例需要映像名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您不會想要有統一的背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型用於所有項目和子項中您控制項，您可以設定這個屬性為`false`。If you do not want to have a uniform background color, foreground color, and font used for all items and subitems in your control, you can set this property to `false`. 當這個屬性設定為`true`，子項目所做的變更， ，和屬性會被忽略，並會改用項目的值。When this property is set to `true`, any changes made to the subitem's , , and properties are ignored, and the values of the item are used instead. 您可以使用這個屬性，如果您要指定不同的文字色彩、 背景色彩或字型，才能用於時子項目會顯示在中，反白顯示之項目的子項目控制項。You can use this property if you need to specify a different text color, background color, or font to be used for a subitem to highlight the item when subitems are displayed in the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性，以`false`定義的自訂樣式物件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to `false` to define a custom style for objects. 此範例也會示範如何設定和屬性。The example also demonstrates how to set the and properties. 要執行此範例，請將下列程式碼貼到表單並呼叫`InitializeListView`表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理方法。To run the example, paste the following code into a form and call the `InitializeListView` method in form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/VB/form1.vb#1)]
